data.text: @SenDanSullivan Maybe call it the “Apartheid Early Learning Center” where only Jewish children from anywhere on earth have a right of return to the daycare in AK. You can exclude Native children who have lived here for generations and claim that only Jews have a right to attend the daycare. 😂.

@SenDanSullivan I like how it’s “all inclusive”. If this was in Israel I bet it would be a Jewish only apartheid daycare center unless the Arab children (Christian, Muslim, etc …) came with US backed funding then the Zionist Jews would probably allow non Jewish children into the daycare. 😂
@SenDanSullivan Could someone please ask Dan what he thinks about Trump’s name being in this #EpsteinFiles 5000 times just on what was released this weekend?
@SenDanSullivan wtf does that mean ? Are you going to purposely deny whites ?

@SenDanSullivan I don’t want one $ of my tax money to go to this Jewish daycare. I don’t care if people are Jewish but I don’t want to financially support this organization. Using my money to pay for daycare at this organization is a violation of the Constitution.

@SenDanSullivan Here is how the scam works - get the govt to expand the definition of special needs, get the govt to use tax money to pay for the special needs kids, then give the money to a religious organization because they want state money for their religious organization. Unconstitutional!

@JayArmstrongUSA @SenDanSullivan Giving US tax dollars to a Jewish apartheid state violates the establishment clause of the U.S.
Constitution.
